title: Saul’s Unlawful Sacrifice
summary: In 1 Samuel 13, Saul prepares to battle the Philistines but grows impatient waiting for Samuel. He offers the burnt offering himself, violating God’s command. Samuel arrives and rebukes Saul, telling him his kingdom will not endure.

faq.question: What mistake did Saul make?
faq.answer: He offered the burnt offering instead of waiting for Samuel, disobeying God’s instructions.

faq.question: What was the consequence?
faq.answer: Samuel told him his kingdom would not continue and God would choose someone after His own heart.
